com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.PageSelectElement

    Package Description
    com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements
    Contains all of the classes for creating web elements and acting upon them.

      class  Dropdown
      Dropdown implementation of a WebElement.
      Methods in com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements that return PageSelectElement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PageSelectElement ElementFunctions.getElementAsSelectElement(String elementName)
      Returns the PageSelectElement associated with the element name on the currently active page.
      PageSelectElement PageSelectElement.select(int index)
      Selects an option from a drop down using the ordinal value of the item to select.
      PageSelectElement PageSelectElement.select(SelectorType selectorType, String selectText)
      Selects an option from a drop down.
      PageSelectElement PageSelectElement.select(String selectText)
      Selects an option from a drop down using the text value of the item to select.
